column2: create table SqlErrorMessage (--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/H a row for each distinct SQL error message in the SQL Log. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/T See also the SqlLogAll view that denomalizes the table. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- errorMessageID int identity (#, #) not # primary key, --/D unique identifier errorMessage varchar (#) not #, --/D the SQL error message hits int not # --/D how many times it occurred in the log.) go
